Najah:

"Ssssstand down... sssstand down????!!!!!" Said Najah while he tried 
to free him "Told me ssssir, if one of thosssse maximals wantssss 
ssskin me alive can I defend myssssself or not????"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus sees Najah attacking Hot Rod, flying down to the fighting 
pair.
> 
> "Najah, stand down. We are here to assist the Maximals this time," 
he
> says, more than a bit mad at Najah for attacking this Maximal.
> 
> 
>

> > 
> > "And Alliance will kick yoursssssss" hissed annoyed Najah while 
he

time...

head,
